channel.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
channel.description:
Remaking this thread because it's time for the real deal.
This is what I got:
[img]https://a8.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/478984_4405841981517_53670372_o.jpg[/img]
Come at me.

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Yeah. I’ve started playing Dwarf Fortress between classes for exactly that reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I like games that I can eat food while playing. Turn based RPGs are well suited to that, thus they’re easier to schedule in a busy day.

Read full topic
item.source: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: VortigauntProduction
item.description:
I had some coca cola while playing… and I haven’t actually finished yet
Been sooo busy! Hopefully soon though Great game thus far

Read full topic
item.source: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I do. You can eat real food and game at the same time, it’s just messy and less than ideal.

item.description:
you people fucking eat while playing video games? what the actual shit STOP PLAYING THE GAME AND EAT REAL FOOD

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
k3nny1550:

I had to go to a coffee shop to steal bandwidth to download the mod. While I waited, I had a Cesar salad and some water.

Really? I only ever eat cookies when I’m stuck in a coffee shop to use the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Food and drink to go with Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I’ve been drinking water all day while playing.

Not eating anything, because I like to keep my mouse and keyboard (relatively) clean, no food particles.
